disp-quote.p: " Unfortunately there is no feedback. We, field agents feel we are orphans, that's the word, orphan, because we do not get any feedback. Our supervisors do not tell us what our evaluation was like, we do not know what is going on. The only feedback we get is that we are not meeting the goals "(ACE65).

" The importance of feedback would be to relay information to the residents. We do not know how the disease situation in the city is. The resident asks and we do not know how to answer about our own job. In the epidemic, we did not even know the number of cases "(ACE3).
